name: Toothy Mandrills of the Artifact
description: Often found in nearby Wandererâ€™s Refuge, the Toothy Mandrills of the Artifact are known for their strength, vitality, and good fortune. One of the few who witnessed the Osmerian Anomaly, and equipped with the knowledge of what may have actually happened, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
